# [[fish]]

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[ご]] (go) {{qualifier|non-[[w:Jōyō kanji|Jōyō]] reading}}
|kanon=[[ぎょ]] (gyo)
|kun=[[うお]] (uo), [[いお]] (io), [[お]] (o), [[な]] (na), [[さかな]] (sakana), [[すなどる|すなど.る]] ({{ja-l|魚る}} sunado.ru) {{qualifier|rare}}

}}

====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds with irregular readings}}
* {{ja-r|魚屋|ととや}}: a fish [[store]] or [[shop]]; a type of [[bowl]] originally from Korea, used in [[tea ceremony]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 1===
[[File:Macropodus_opercularis_-_front_(aka).jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|魚}} (''uo'', ''io'', ''o'', ''sakana''): fish]]
{{ja-kanjitab|うお|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=うお}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The pronunciation shifted from {{IPAchar|/uwo/}} to {{IPAchar|/uo/}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|うお|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|a=Ja-uo-fish.oga}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|うお|hhira=うを}}

# [[fish]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|活魚|いけうお}}: live fish and shellfish (kept in a tank in a restaurant)
* {{ja-r|魚河岸|うおがし}}: riverside fish market
* {{ja-r|魚座|うおざ}}: [[Pisces]] (constellation), the Fish, the Fishes;
* {{ja-r|魚印|うおじるし}}: a [[mark]] made on a fish, such as a [[cut]] on a [[fin]], to identify one's own catch when fishing together with others
* {{ja-r|魚釣り|うおつり}}: [[fishing]]
* {{ja-r|魚屋|うおや}}: a [[fishmonger]]
* {{ja-r|魚市場|うお いちば}}: a [[fish]] [[market]]
* {{ja-r|魚河岸|うおがし}}: a [[riverside]] [[fish]] [[market]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|雷魚|かみなりうお}}: [[sailfin sandfish]]
* {{ja-r|川魚|かわうお}}: river fish; [[freshwater]] fish
* {{ja-r|山椒魚|さんしょううお}}: a [[salamander]]
* {{ja-r|白魚|しらうお}}: [[icefish]]
* {{ja-r|刺魚|とげうお}}: a [[stickleback]] fish
* {{ja-r|飛び魚|とびうお}}: [[flying fish]]
* {{ja-r|氷魚|ひうお}}): a [[transparent]] [[sweetfish]] [[fingerling]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|いお|yomi=k}}
Alteration of older ''uo'', appearing from roughly the [[w:Heian period|Heian period]]. Still used in modern {{etyl|ja|-}} some dialects.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The pronunciation shifted from {{IPAchar|/uwo/}} to {{IPAchar|/iwo/}} to {{IPAchar|/io/}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|いお}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いお|hhira=いを}}

# [[fish]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|お|yomi=k}}
Shortening of ''uo'', appearing only in compounds.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The pronunciation shifted from {{IPAchar|/uwo/}} to {{IPAchar|/wo/}} to {{IPAchar|/o/}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|お}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|お|hhira=を}}

# [[fish]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|大魚|おうお}}: a [[big]] [[fish]]
* {{ja-r|鰹|かつお}}: a [[skipjack tuna]]
* {{ja-r|針魚|はりお}}: Japanese halfbeak
* {{ja-r|氷魚|ひお}}: a [[transparent]] [[sweetfish]] [[fingerling]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 4===
[[File:GrilledCongridae.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|魚}} (''na''): fish as a [[side dish]]]]
{{ja-kanjitab|な|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=な}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|な|tr=na||a side dish}}, spelled variously in kanji in modern Japanese as {{m|ja|肴|pos=for meat or fish}}, {{m|ja|菜|pos=for vegetables}}, {{m|ja|魚|pos=for fish}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|な}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|な}}

# [[fish]], especially as [[food]]
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|5|869}}
#*: {{lang|ja|多良志比賣 可尾能美許等能 '''奈'''都良須等 美多々志世利斯 伊志遠多礼美吉}}
#*: {{lang|ja|足姫　神の命の　'''魚'''釣らすと　み立たしせりし　石を誰れ見き}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|たらしひめ　かみのみことの　'''な'''つらすと　みたたしせりし　いしをたれみき}}
#*:: ''tarashi hime kami no mikoto no '''na''' tsurasu to mi-tatashi serishi ishi wo tare miki''
#*::: who saw the rock that rose up against us as we tried to catch the '''fish''' belonging to the empress?
#* {{RQ:Man'yōshū|2|131}}
#*: {{lang|ja|滷者無鞆　鯨'''魚'''取 海邊乎指而 和多豆乃 荒礒乃上尓 香青生　玉藻息津藻 朝羽振 風社依米}}
#*: {{lang|ja|潟はなくとも　鯨魚取り　海辺を指して　柔田津の　荒礒の上に　か青なる　玉藻沖つ藻 朝羽振る 風こそ寄せめ}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|かたはなくとも　いさ'''な'''とり　うみへをさして　にきたづの　ありそのうへに　かあをなる　たまもおきつも　あさはふる　かぜこそよせめ}}
#*:: ''kata wa naku to mo isa'''na''' tori umihe wo sashite Nikitadzu no ariso no uhe ni kaawo naru tamamo oki tsu mo asa ni furu kaze koso yoseme''
#*::: Even though there is no inlet, the wind that blows in the morning gathers green seaweed pearls and offshore seaweed onto the rocky beaches of Nikitazu along the big-'''fish'''-hunting [metaphor for "sea"] shore...

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|魚|さかな}} {{qualifier|see below}}
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 5===
[[File:Beer_and_edamame_(boild_green_soybeans).jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|魚}}, {{l|ja|肴}} (''sakana''): a [[side dish]] served with [[alcoholic]] [[beverage]]s]]
{{ja-kanjitab|さかな|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さかな}} elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=さかな|酒|tr1=saka|t1=sake, rice wine|菜|tr2=na|t2=side dish|pos2=see also ''na'' above}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Likely source of Okinawan ''[[さかな#Okinawan|sakana]]''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さかな|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|肴}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さかな}}

# [[fish]]
# a [[side dish]] served with [[alcoholic]] [[beverage]]s: not necessarily [[fish]], may be a [[vegetable]] or other [[meat]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=さかな|archaic}} [[entertainment]] at a [[drinking]] [[party]]

=====Usage notes=====
This is now the most common general word for {{m|en|fish}} in modern standard Japanese. The {{m|en|side dish}} sense is more commonly spelled {{ja-l|肴}}.

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|小魚|こざかな}}: small fish
* {{ja-r|下魚|げざかな}}: inferior fish, cheap fish
* {{ja-r|魚釣り|さかなつり}}: [[fishing]]
* {{ja-r|魚屋|さかなや}}: a [[fishmonger]]; a fish [[store]] or [[shop]]
* {{ja-r|魚河岸|さかながし}}: a [[riverside]] [[fish]] [[market]]
* {{ja-r|生魚|なまざかな}}: raw fish
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|ぎょ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きょ'}} {{m|ltc|魚}} ({{IPAchar|/ŋiɔ/}}). Compare modern {{cog|cmn|魚|tr=yú}}.

Used in compounds.

====Affix====
{{ja-pos|affix|ぎょ}}

# [[fish]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|魚綾|ぎょりょう}}, {{ja-r|魚陵|ぎょりょう}}, {{ja-r|魚竜|ぎょりょう}}: a kind of high-quality [[twill]]
* {{ja-r|魚綾|ぎょりゅう}}: an [[ichthyosaur]]; a kind of high-quality [[twill]]
* {{ja-r|魚影|ぎょえい}}: {{qualifier|fishing terminology}} the [[appearance]] of [[fish]] in the [[water]]
* {{ja-r|魚塩|ぎょえん}}: general term for [[marine]] [[product]]s: [[fish]] and [[salt]]; a [[purveyor]] of marine products
* {{ja-r|魚価|ぎょか}}: the [[price]] of [[fish]]
* {{ja-r|魚類|ぎょるい}}: [[fish]] {{qualifier|as a type of animal in biology}}
* {{ja-r|魚類学|ぎょるいがく}}: [[ichthyology]]
* {{ja-r|魚類学者|ぎょるいがくしゃ}}: [[ichthyologist]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|金魚|きんぎょ}}: [[goldfish]]
{{der-bottom}}
